q1.question: How will your country resist colonial rule?

q2a.question: What ideology will shape your new nation?

options.text: Adopt colonial institutions with national identity
Reject colonial institutions and revive indigenous culture

q2b.question: What form of resistance will you choose?

q3a.question: How will you integrate with the global economy?

q3b.question: What role will national identity play?

q3c.question: How will you structure the post-colonial government?

q3d.question: How will your post-colonial economy be structured?

q4a.question: How will you manage political stability?

q4b.question: Will you align with socialist movements?

options.text: No, maintain a hybrid economic model

q4c.question: How will cultural identity influence governance?

options.text: Blend national heritage with modern governance
Yes, but with private sector leadership

q4e.question: What is the priority of your revolutionary government?

q4h.question: How will political governance be handled?

options.text: Democratic but with strong nationalist elements

result_singapore.name: Singapore
result_singapore.description: A capitalist success story that retained colonial institutions while modernizing.

result_hongkong.name: Hong Kong
result_hongkong.description: A city-state that kept colonial legal and economic systems.

result_turkey.name: Turkey
result_turkey.description: A state-led modernization project with nationalist elements.

result_malaysia.name: Malaysia
result_malaysia.description: A country that maintained colonial institutions while balancing nationalism.

result_india.description: A culturally revived nation that sought self-rule through nonviolence.

result_thailand.description: A monarchy balancing tradition and modernity.

result_japan.description: A country that rapidly industrialized and became a global power.

result_taiwan.name: Taiwan
result_taiwan.description: A nation balancing industrialization with democracy.

result_china.name: China
result_china.description: A communist state that pursued self-sufficiency.

result_cuba.description: A socialist nation that resisted neo-colonial influence.

result_indonesia.name: Indonesia
result_indonesia.description: A nationalist economy that balanced open markets.

result_philippines.name: Philippines
result_philippines.description: A post-colonial democracy influenced by its colonial past.
